name: Portal Balls
description:
Portal balls is a new action game that challenge you to make faster times in each level.

There are five differents worlds, each one more challenging: 

  1. Newbie
  2. Advanced
  3. Master
  4. Expert
  5.  Hardcore.

To play the next world you need a few amount of stars to unlock it, you win stars making good times in each level.

We introduced a shop where you can buy a different skins to your ball
